recipes.name: Pancakes with Maple Syrup & Berries
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Heat a skillet and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with maple syrup and fresh berries.

recipes.name: Oats & Chia Pudding with Honey
instructions: Mix oats, chia seeds, milk, honey, and vanilla in a jar.
Stir well and refrigerate overnight.
Stir again in the morning and top with fresh fruits.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Masala Omelette with Toast
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl and add onion, tomatoes, chili, turmeric, and salt.
Heat oil in a pan and pour the egg mixture.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with toasted bread.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Toast the bread slices.
Poach the egg in simmering water.
Spread avocado mixture on toast and top with poached egg.
Sprinkle chili flakes if desired.

recipes.name: Banana & Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend bananas, yogurt, peanut butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and fresh fruits.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Season chicken breast with salt and pepper, then grill until cooked through.
Slice the grilled chicken into strips.
In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Add the grilled chicken strips and drizzle with Caesar dressing.
Toss gently and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic until golden.
Add red chili flakes and cooked spaghetti to the pan.
Toss well to coat the spaghetti in the oil.
Season with salt and garnish with parsley.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Naan
instructions: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, and garam masala. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates.
Add paneer cubes and cream, then simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and serve hot with naan.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry with Jasmine Rice
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, etc.)
instructions: Cook jasmine rice according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté green curry paste for 1-2 minutes.
Add chicken or tofu and cook until done.
Add coconut milk, vegetables, and fish sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with jasmine rice and garnish with basil leaves.

recipes.name: Dal Tadka with Jeera Rice
instructions: Cook lentils with turmeric and salt until soft.
Heat ghee in a pan and temper cumin seeds, garlic, and green chili.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft, then mix with cooked lentils.
For jeera rice, cook basmati rice and temper with cumin seeds.
Serve dal tadka with jeera rice, garnished with coriander.

recipes.name: Loaded Nachos with Cheese & Salsa
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake until cheese melts.
Top with salsa, sour cream, guacamole, and jalapeños.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls with Spicy Dip
instructions: Sauté cabbage, carrots, and bean sprouts with soy sauce and ginger-garlic paste.
Place filling on spring roll wrappers and roll tightly.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with chili sauce for dipping.

recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Spread tomato sauce on the pizza base.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese and top with basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Samosa Chaat with Yogurt & Chutneys
instructions: Crush samosas into a bowl.
Top with yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney.
Add onions, tomatoes, and sev.
Garnish with coriander and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Bruschetta with Tomato & Basil
instructions: Toast baguette slices until crispy.
Rub garlic on the toasted bread.
Mix tomatoes, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Top the bread with the tomato mixture and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Garlic Butter
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon until cooked through.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add lemon juice and drizzle over grilled salmon.
Garnish with dill and serve.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa Veggies
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Cut the tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Mix quinoa, vegetables, and cheese. Stuff into bell peppers.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken with Tandoori Roti
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric, red chili powder, and salt.
Heat butter in a pan and cook chicken until done.
Add tomato puree, garam masala, and cream. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with tandoori roti.

recipes.name: Mexican Tacos with Guacamole
instructions: Cook ground beef or chicken with taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with the cooked meat.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, guacamole, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Stir Fried Noodles with Tofu & Veggies
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, cabbage)
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Heat sesame oil and sauté garlic, ginger, and chili.
Add tofu and vegetables, then stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add noodles and soy sauce, then toss well.
Serve hot.
